## types.DeepMutable type

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type DeepMutable<T extends Record<PropertyKey, any>> = T extends (...args: any[]) => any ? T : {
    -readonly [K in keyof T]: DeepMutable<T[K]>;
};
```
